item.title: Installation
item.description: You need Steam and Epic games store installed and logged in before starting. This will not be required after official release. You need Steam installed and opened. In order to get the game more polished, currently the updates are being delayed. You can download the zip files on https://dl.whatthesamuel.com(Important! The email security code is a Cloudflare feature. I don’t collect any data). I recommend you download the latest version by looking at the dates next to the file names

item.title: Playing multiplayer
item.description: Method 1: The “Normal” Way Notice when playing Multiplayer Due to the instability of Steam networking implementation, it is reccomended to have Epic Games Launcher installed and logged in at the same time. Both must be opened and logged in to play multiplayer. Check if Steam and Epic Games Launcher is both logged in and running Run the game and check if you can access the steam or epic friends menu, if not, you’ll see an error message.

item.title: Instructions
item.description: How to play Controls W, S, A, D to move Space to jump left shift to sprint Move mouse to look around Left click to shoot Right click to aim(zoom in) 1, 2 on keyboard(not numpad) to switch weapons R to reload Esc to open menu, etc… How to exit press esc-> exit How to play multiplayer Read this page: link

item.title: Configuration
item.description: Go to ‘Options’ in the main menu and change the settings as you like.
